body_html:
Not for this PR, but we can do something similar for CPU leaks too; all we need to do is distinguish between tensor allocations (unlikely to stay live across tests) and metadata allocations (we won't track leaks for those.)

Although, when @gchanan has his way all the manual refcounting in TH will go away and it should become a lot harder to make this kind of mistake.
